positive_examples: This is an example of regulating.
We observed regulating in this context.
A typical case of regulating would involve these features.
The concept of regulating applies here.
The process of controlling or governing according to rules, principles, or systematic methods.
negative_examples: This is an example of capturing, not regulating.
This represents achieving control in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Capturing, or other types of AchievingControl

definition: The act of controlling or maintaining something within desired parameters.
